task.title: Thread the Ribbon
task.shortdesc: You can use your typewriterâ€™s ribbon vibrator guides to thread your new ink ribbon.

taskbody.prereq: Prior to threading the ribbon, your ribbon spools must to be in their respective spool holders.

step.cmd: Feed the length of ribbon between the two ribbon spools through the small slots on each side of the ribbon guide. Take care to not stretch the ribbon.
Gently rotate each ribbon spool so that the ribbon is taut. Take care to not over-tighten your ribbon.
